appName.description: Online service of Dolibarr ERP & CRM in the Cloud (invoices, customers, suppliers, proposals, agenda, products, emailings).

appDesc.description: DoliCloud is the online service of Dolibarr ERP & CRM openSource software in the Cloud. Enable features you need (invoices, customers, suppliers, proposals, agenda, products, stocks, emailings, ...) and use a personalized solution to manage your business.
